issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Field requires API level 29 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_EXIF_OFFSET`
Field requires API level 29 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_EXIF_LENGTH`
Field requires API level 28 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_HAS_IMAGE`
Field requires API level 28 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_IMAGE_WIDTH`
Field requires API level 28 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_IMAGE_HEIGHT`
Field requires API level 28 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_IMAGE_ROTATION`
Field requires API level 17 (current min is 14): `android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever#METADATA_KEY_VIDEO_ROTATION`
Use of synchronized methods is not recommended

This call is to a method from API 21, the call containing class androidx.exifinterface.media.ExifInterface is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 21. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(21) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(21).
